name: Hotel Tilsitt Etoile Paris

reviews.text: Good location, good breakfast and good service. for a weekend
reviews.title: Great Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: for three women sharing a room.
reviews.title: Wonderfully charming hotel

likes.liked: — the decor and the staff (and the croissants)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The beds were clean and comfortable and the towels white and fluffy.
reviews.title: Fantastic service, friendly staff, great location, loved it!

reviews.text: There were no tea/coffee making facilities in the room, however,
reviews.title: Really enjoyed our stay at Hotel Tilsitt Etoile Paris

reviews.text: when we requested a kettle, this was provided at no extra cost
reviews.title: Charming hotel, great location

likes.liked: — Front desk staff, charming hotel, heated towel rack, wonderful breakfast

reviews.text: I stayed here with my girlfriend and my parents for the easter weekend.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is great its close to the Arc de Triomphe and the Champs Elysees. While being close to such heavily visited things in Paris youre staying in a peacefull street so no loud noise from outside or what so ever.
reviews.title: Very Good Value

reviews.text: The rooms arent big but there great for couples. It was more cozy then it was annoying. Also at the arrival the rooms where nicely cleaned and the mini bar was filled with enough drinks. Enough towels, soap and a VERY clean bathroom!
reviews.title: Great personnal service and tourism information!!

likes.liked: — The Front desk service and location!

reviews.title: Consistently Excellent
reviews.text: The breakfast was great. Alot of different food you can eat such as fruit, yogurt, bread, croissaints and some other france delights. Also there's a constant supply of Jus d'orange while having breakfast. They even made a 'special dishes' because it was easter

The staff was very friendly and helpfull. The staff that worked at kitchen for breakfast worked really hard to keep the supply of food constant and they also were very friendly if you asked for something else.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel in Paris

reviews.text: Great price, excellent breakfast, great rooms, and very helpful nice staff! Loved the 24-hour bar area and hotel is very close to everything! Would definitely stay again.
reviews.title: Love It!

likes.liked: — The reception staff and the breakfast

reviews.title: Like your home But in Paris
reviews.text: Great service , full service , excelent facilities inside and around the hotel , few steps from main turistcs points and main subway stations , estrategicaly located.
We chose this hotel for a 2 day family stay due to its excellent reviews. I'm pleased to say these are well deserved.
reviews.title: Ideal Paris Base

reviews.text: The hotel is easy to find and not too far from the Charles de Gaulle Metro station (downhill on the way there). The staff were friendly and welcoming, but not intrusive. Access to rooms via the lift was good, and the size of our rooms on the 6th floor was good (for Paris) I was worried that the room might be cold, on the top floor under the tiles, but need not have worried, and we unplugged the extra, electric radiator supplied. The room was clean and the bed comfortable with attractive clean linen. The bathroom was fine, although water pressure on the 6th floor wasn't powerful in the shower.
reviews.title: Great price/quality ratio

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We opted for breakfast in the charming basement breakfast room, maybe slightly expensive at 13euro but delicious especially the orange juice and coffee.
reviews.title: So wonderful!!

likes.liked: — The people, the room, the location, the decor
likes.disliked: — hearing the people next to us at 2 a.m.

reviews.title: Large rooms, great location and super price
reviews.text: Wifi worked, breakfast was delivered to our room and it was good. I really liked how our room had a split bathroom. Take a look at our pictures :) It's a very family friendly place and we stayed at other hotels in paris and you will not find this kind of room at this price.
We found that there was no need for a view, our room was nicely lit with natural diffused light.
reviews.title: Reasonably priced, brilliant area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My partner and I stayed at the Tilsitt hotel in Jan 08. We were pleasantly surprised by the interior.
reviews.title: Great Hotel
Home feel Hotel
reviews.text: The reception room leads to the bar lounge area, which is very nicely decorated. Although we rarely saw a bar tender present.

reviews.title: Best placed but not best priced.
reviews.text: The lift is very small so bear this in mind if you have lots of luggage. We only stayed a night so it wasn't a problem. If you walk down the stairs, you'll notice the hard wood floors on the ground floor. Really lovely.

description: Two steps away from the Champs Elysees, the Arc de triomphe and the Palais des Congres, this charming 3 stars design hotel is the perfect place to stay, right in the heart of Paris...
